statements: SELECT student_id, student_name, course_id, course_name, grade FROM student_performance WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM student_performance WHERE course_id = 101;
SELECT student_name, course_name, grade FROM student_performance WHERE grade = 'A';
SELECT course_id, course_name FROM student_performance WHERE student_id = 2;
SELECT student_name FROM student_performance WHERE course_name = 'Math';
SELECT * FROM student_performance WHERE grade = 'A' ORDER BY student_name DESC
SELECT student_name, grade FROM student_performance WHERE course_id = 101 ORDER BY grade ASC
SELECT course_name, COUNT(student_id) AS total_students FROM student_performance GROUP BY course_name HAVING COUNT(student_id) > 5
SELECT student_id, student_name, course_name, count(*) AS total_grades FROM student_performance GROUP BY student_id, course_id HAVING total_grades > 3 ORDER BY student_id
SELECT DISTINCT course_id, course_name FROM student_performance ORDER BY course_name
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT student_name, student_grade FROM students WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT DISTINCT student_grade FROM students;
SELECT student_name, enrolment_date FROM students ORDER BY enrolment_date DESC;
SELECT course_name, course_teacher FROM courses WHERE course_duration > 10;
SELECT * FROM students ORDER BY student_name DESC, student_id ASC;
SELECT student_id, student_name, enrolment_date FROM students WHERE student_id > 10 AND student_grade = 'A' ORDER BY enrolment_date ASC;
SELECT student_name, student_grade, enrolment_date, course_name FROM students LEFT JOIN courses ON students.student_id = courses.course_id;
SELECT course_name, course_teacher FROM courses WHERE course_duration > 5 ORDER BY course_duration DESC;
SELECT student_name, COUNT(course_id) AS num_courses FROM students LEFT JOIN courses ON students.student_id = courses.course_id GROUP BY student_name HAVING num_courses > 3 ORDER BY num_courses DESC;
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT student_name, age FROM students ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT student_name, gender FROM students WHERE age > 20;
SELECT * FROM courses WHERE instructor = 'John Doe';
SELECT course_name, start_date, end_date FROM courses WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM students ORDER BY student_id DESC;
SELECT student_name, age FROM students WHERE gender='Female';
SELECT course_name, instructor, start_date, end_date FROM courses WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT student_id, course_id, enrollment_date FROM student_courses WHERE completion_status = TRUE;
SELECT student_name, age, course_name FROM students JOIN student_courses ON students.student_id = student_courses.student_id;
SELECT * FROM Students;
SELECT student_name, enrollment_date FROM Students ORDER BY enrollment_date DESC;
SELECT course_name, course_description FROM Courses WHERE course_id = 1;
SELECT student_id, course_id, completion_status FROM Enrollments WHERE completion_status = TRUE;
SELECT student_name, course_name, performance_score FROM Students s, Courses c, Reports r WHERE s.student_id = r.student_id AND c.course_id = r.course_id;
SELECT * FROM Students;
SELECT student_id, student_name FROM Students WHERE enrollment_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT course_name, course_description FROM Courses WHERE course_id IN (1, 2, 3);

SELECT student_name, enrollment_date, course_name, completion_status FROM Students JOIN Enrollments ON Students.student_id = Enrollments.student_id JOIN Courses ON Enrollments.course_id = Courses.course_id WHERE Students.student_name LIKE 'John%';

SELECT student_name, course_name, performance_score FROM Students JOIN Reports ON Students.student_id = Reports.student_id JOIN Courses ON Reports.course_id = Courses.course_id WHERE performance_score > 80 ORDER BY performance_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM Students;
SELECT student_name, student_age FROM Students ORDER BY student_age DESC;
SELECT course_name, course_description FROM Courses;
SELECT student_name, course_name, report_content FROM Students INNER JOIN Reports ON Students.student_id = Reports.student_id;
SELECT student_name, course_name, grade FROM Students INNER JOIN Grades ON Students.student_id = Grades.student_id ORDER BY grade DESC;
SELECT * FROM Students;
SELECT student_id, student_name, student_age FROM Students WHERE student_age > 20;
SELECT student_name, course_name FROM Students JOIN Courses ON Students.course_id = Courses.course_id;
SELECT student_name, report_content FROM Students JOIN Reports ON Students.student_id = Reports.student_id WHERE Reports.report_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT course_name, AVG(grade) as average_grade FROM Courses JOIN Grades ON Courses.course_id = Grades.course_id GROUP BY Courses.course_id;
